enum.name: symmetrical
enum.help: Make the indicator grow symmetrically left and right from the midpoint

prop.name: start_angle
prop.help: Set the start angle of the indicator

prop.name: end_angle
prop.help: Set the end angle of the indicator

prop.name: bg_start_angle
prop.help: Set the start angle of the background arc

prop.name: bg_end_angle
prop.help: Set the end angle of the background arc

prop.name: rotation
prop.help: Rotate the whole arc by a given angle

prop.name: min_value
prop.help: Set the minimum value of the arc

prop.name: max_value
prop.help: Set the maximum value of the arc

prop.name: value
prop.help: Set the current value of the arc (between minimum and maximum)

prop.name: bind_value
prop.help: Bind the arc’s value to a subject
